review_text: This was such a wonderful place to stay ! Just a very short drive to Kentucky Horse Park. The area was beautiful and we loved the peaceful quiet of the cabin. Very cozy and comfortable. We enjoyed sitting on the screened in porch in the morning and evening and enjoying the sounds of nature and watching wildlife at the river. Wish we could have stayed longer. Beds were very comfortable and it was well stocked with anything you would need. I highly recommend it.

We loved our stay. Well stocked kitchen, very tidy & clean, very comfortable bed, nice linens, and relaxing view of the creek on the screened porch. During the day we visited two nice off-leash dog parks 10-15 üê∂mins away, botanical gardens, and Henry Clay home/gardens. Highly recommend Sage Rabbit restaurant, W. 6th St. brewery & Smithtown seafood, and Wallace Station (all dog friendly) & delish!! Also, a cycling friendly area. üö¥üèΩ
Exactly as described--beautiful setting, peaceful, tranquil. Perfect for dogs and humans alike. We'll definitely be repeat customers!
We had an amazing experience at Julia and Hals! The pictures do not do this place justice, we hope to visit again!
Loved it. The enclosed porch was great for coffee in the mornings. The fire pit was great for gathering around at night. Will definitely stay again if available.

The cabin was charming and cozy. The screened in porch with views of the lovely creek and trees was a nice spot for morning coffee & an evening glass of wine. Listening to the many types of birds chirping was definitely serene.
It was a very cozy place to come back to after a long day at Keeneland or a day out visiting horse farms & exploring Lexington.
Even a drive along the beautiful country roads surrounding the cabin was delightful.
The added amenity of having horses right on the property was much appreciated. The horses loved our visits with peppermints, carrots & apples in hand.
The cabin is out in the countryside & very quiet & peaceful and yet it is an easy drive into downtown Lexington with the many restaurants & activities available there.
It was a perfect retreat for us as a couple & we will definitely try to return next time we visit Lexington.
Thank you Hal & Julia for being such wonderful hosts!
We enjoyed our stay! My 4 and 7 year old especially loved bonding with the horses everyday. Highly recommend!
It is set in a nice location.
Extraordinarily nice hosts. Very clean. Loved the riverview and wildlife. Comfortable plush queen bed and linens. Thank you for a peaceful enjoyable stay.

What a beautiful setting. Wooded area behind the home overlooking running stream. Woke every morning with the sound of migrating geese at a pond nearby. Friendly horses in the stable next door that our kids loved visiting with through the fence. Green egg on the wood deck, fire and starter logs for the fireplace. Super comfortable master bed. Honored to be there.

We loved our stay here. Very peaceful and secluded. Hosts were great to work with and very responsive. Loved seeing the horses on the property. Highly recommend and would stay here again in a heartbeat!

What a beautiful and peaceful setting! We truly enjoyed the cozy fireplace, waking up to the sounds of birds, and sitting on the screened in porch listening to sound of the creek! We also enjoyed the beautiful horses and beautiful horse farms in the area!
Hal was very helpful and kind!

We booked for a short weekend stay, we wanted to have another small little adventure with our dog before our new baby‚Äôs arrival. Julia and Hal have the perfect place, it was wonderful too see our dog so over joyed meeting the horses. We definitely will rebook once the weather is nicer and our baby is here. Their horses are beautiful and friendly we had fun feeding them apples and carrotsü§ó
Beautiful property! Very private, loved being away from the commotion of the city but still being 6 minutes from everything.

If you like privacy, and horses, the place to be. We never met owners, would have liked to, they did communicate with us and was very polite and giving, will definitely go back, weather was a bit bad on our stay, but certainly enjoyed our stay. Personally, my next get away will be there, hope it is soon and sunny, thank you guys for letting us stay at your cottage.

I had a pleasant, peaceful stay with my dog in the cabin. Hal and Julia were always available and friendly, as were the horses! The kitchen had everything I needed to cook meals for myself, the bed was comfortable, and the fireplace was a fabulous touch on chilly evenings. The WiFi had an attitude, but I believe this is being fixed. I will definitely be back!
Julia and Hal have a beautiful property! My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Fantastic hosts!!
We were very happy with our stay. If we were in the area again, this would be our first choice in lodging.
We were looking for a spot to meet up with family to relax & recharge... it was the perfect location! Just as described. Absolutely beautiful!

A wonderful and peaceful place tucked away in a gorgeous spot by the river! We enjoyed watching the horses and ponies as well as gazing at the stars at night! Loved the 2 sided fireplace and the very comfortable bed! Incredible drive among beautiful horse farms to get there while convenient to great restaurants also!
Great little spot in a very quiet corner of the farm!
We throughly enjoyed our stay. It was incredibly peaceful and calm. The horses were a delight to be around. The host was so kind and friendly. We would love to come back some day!

The cabin/cottage was perfect for our stay in Lexington. It was close to the Kentucky Horse Park, where our daughter was showing her horse, and an easy drive to restaurants and sights. It is just as in the photos; we even saw a huge buck one evening while walking our dogs. The beds were comfortable and the hot water plentiful. Plus, there was plenty of room for the whole family. The hosts are excellent.
Julia and Hal place is clean, quiet place to relax and enjoy the area events.

Perfect place in the heart of horse country to stay while attending Keeneland! We enjoyed breakfast on the back porch ober looking a peaceful creek and feeding the horses apples every morning. Would definitely recommend and stay again next time we're in town!
Perfect stay as usual! It‚Äôs our favorite, so this was our 3rd time staying here & definitely won‚Äôt be our last. Beautiful, clean & peaceful. Horses & nature. You can‚Äôt go wrong here.

Beautiful, quiet place. Felt safe. Had all the amenities needed. I stayed there with my family for the 2023 RRP and the proximity to the Kentucky Horse Park was ideal. It made to going back and forth extremely easy. The kids loved the zip line and we enjoyed gilling on the porch. Any concerns we had were addressed immediately. I would definitely recommend and stay there again.

What a beautiful location and awesome AirBnb! We had a fabulous time in Lexington. The AirBnb is on a horse farm, my favorite part was seeing the horses each morning who would come greet us and our pups. Thank you, Julia and Hal, for being awesome hosts!
Beautiful, well equipped, enjoyed our stay!
Will definitely be back. Thank you guys for everything!
Thank you, we enjoyed our stay.

We had a really good experience. It was a great place to relax after a busy day of activities. The interaction with the staff and horses were great. The staff were approachable and receptive to questions. They made you feel welcome.

The cottage was very comfortable and located in a beautiful area. I grew up on a horse farm not far from there and it felt like I was back home. Julia and Hal were very responsive to our requests. We had a wonderful time and would absolutely recommend staying there!!
Enjoyed staying on the horse farm

Hal and Julia‚Äôs cabin was absolutely delightful and the perfect location for anyone showing at Kentucky Horse Park or desiring a stay in the country but just 20-30 min from downtown Lexington. We will be back!

Had a great week at the cabin while in town for Show at Ky Horse Park, less than a 10 minute drive. Perfect setup, nice kitchen, good bed, very nice bathrooms. My daughter loved the zipline, she wore it out all week. Lovely location on a working farm, watched a portion of an equestrian lesson one morning. Very good experience, hope to stay there again.

This was my first vacation in years, like 15 years! I wanted a place that was quiet and more country instead of city all the time. When I pulled up it was so beautiful. I honestly didn't want to come back to the city. I did kayaking for the first time (there is a creek with 2 kayakes in the back) and that was a blast with the family, I fell in love with one of the horses (first time up close with a horse), we checked out Red State BBQ for food and um yes that was yummy! I literally was so close to asking if we could stay another few days. We will definitely be coming back again. Thank you!

Loft was perfect for our girls second and first grade. We loved the kayaks on the stream. The evening sun sparkling on the stream was also an absolute delight. observed English, jumping lessons each morning. We saw Bambi and her parents two separate days as well. Delightful stay.
We booked this Airbnb last year and I love coming back. It‚Äôs so peaceful and private and is a great getaway with horses on the property and being super close to activities!
Nice people, nice cabin, nice horses, and convenient location. My family and I recommend.
Very positive experience. Hosts provide everything needed to make the stay nice and restful.
Cute place. Enjoyed sitting on back porch and watch the deer play by the creek.

Our family really enjoyed staying at the Horse Farm Creekside Cabin. Our family vacation was the perfect balance of adventure and relaxation. The kids loved the zip line and feeding the horses. The creek was serene and we were surprised by the variety of wildlife. We had a wonderful time and would highly recommend this rental!

Very peaceful and beautiful setting. Well suited for two people. The only negative for us was the road to get here is not very walkable and definitely not for biking. The road is very narrow without a shoulder. We took our bikes to the Legacy trail, which is only a few minute drive.
We enjoyed feeding carrots to the ponies and also saw some deer and a fox out by the river in view from the screened porch.

This beautiful creekside cabin was everything we had hoped for and more! I spent every morning sitting on the back screened in patio with my coffee watching the wildlife at the creek. It was so peaceful and re-energizing. I would definitely stay again when visiting the area!
Absolutely beautiful, clean, comfortable - 5/5 recommend!!

We were in town for the National Irish Setter dog show with 2 dogs competing in multiple events. Coming to their place at the end of rach long day was a place of peace for us all to rest mentally and physically. The privacy and beautiful surroundings were a perfect retreat. We would go back in a heartbeat and recommend friends to stay there. We had everything needed to completely enjoy this place of peace and natural beauty. Thank you Hal and Julie!

What a wonderful place! Horses in the front yard, deer and a creek in the back, and an awesome back porch. The house feels bigger than it is and has everything you could need. The surrounding area contains the most gorgeous horse country in the world! We loved it!
Beautiful location and quiet.

Our stay was a wonderful way to get to experience a bit of what makes Kentucky famous. The surrounding countryside is dotted with picturesque horse farms. We watched the horses graze while sitting on the patio and enjoyed the creek views with our morning coffee from the screened-in porch. Feeding the horses apples and carrots was definitely a highlight of our stay!

Such a wonderful little cottage with easy access to everything. We spent a week exploring, Lexington and the surrounding communites, horse farms and distilleries with our two dogs. This was the perfect place to start our day, (complete with carrots, apples and pony pets) and at the end of the day, bourbon sipping and sunset from the screened in porch was a delight. Clean, comfortable, and wonderfully appointed. We will definitely stay again on any future trips to the horse capital! Thank you Julia and Hal - it was hard to leave!

This was such a great experience for our family. Loved being able to relax and have a quiet place for the family. The property was great for a weekend in Lexington and a quick drive to Keeneland. Will definitely look to stay here again.
Very beautiful and peaceful cottage. Loved the indoor fireplace and creek views!

Just returned from a beautiful 4 day get-away with friends. Hal and Julia were wonderful hosts. Their property is lovely and we enjoyed feeding the horse and pony carrots and apples. The cabin had everything you needed for cooking, grilling, and even a stocked Kuerig. Beds were comfortable and we got a lot of use out of the fireplace. (Hal was quick to replenish the firewood when we ran out! ) Sunsets over the creek were spectacular and watching the water was so peaceful. We all felt very comfortable and safe and have already talked about returning.
Beautiful view, so peaceful and quiet. Very convenient location.
Beautiful grounds and the horses were so gentle when we fed them carrots and apples. Close enough to town but far enough away from all the hussle to be completely relaxing!
Quaint place with beautiful surroundings and friendly horses. Good for a family with two small kids. Owners were very responsive and courteous.
Had a great time staying here. Loved being able to use the fireplace with how cold it was outside. Peaceful and quiet. Friendly dogs and horses.

The cabin is beautiful with views of the water and lots of natural light. We leveraged as a peaceful stay between distillery tours in the area. It has a private feel but is still close to surrounding cities including a 10-min drive to Lexington. The horses were super friendly. We had sone weather related issues (out of control of host) and they were very responsive. We appreciated the prompt and friendly communication, firewood and starters, comfortable bed and two bathrooms for getting ready.
Very relaxing. We loved the fire place. Would return!

This cabin on the river was so peaceful and comfortable. With a well stocked kitchen, comfortable furniture, beautiful interior, amazing views and a comfortable main floor bed, we felt right at home. We did stay in cold weather months and brought our 10 month old son. He slept in his playpen which was pretty cold as it rests on the floor. The floor is very cold, which would be nice in warm weather for sure. They have plenty of area rugs but bring slippers and just know it‚Äôs very cold for crawling or sleeping little people. It‚Äôs a very convenient location and again a beautiful setting next to the river among the horse pastures. We will definitely stay again if we are in the area.
Wold have given them 5 stars bot the bed was so bad i was in pain

The property is lovely and easy to find. We woke up to find deer grazing by the creek outside our windows. We would love to come back when the weather is warmer, but made good use of the fireplace while it was cold outside. Lexington has lots of activities to enjoy nearby, and we highly recommend this stay!
Beautiful serene location, loved the fireplace.
The cabin was cute and well decorated. The property and view surrounding the home is beautiful! It‚Äôs very private and cozy. I highly recommend

This was our family's second time staying here. Such a private and peaceful cottage. Very clean and comfortable for a family of four. The views are great; horses on one side and a running creek on the other. A fantastic location if you you plan to explore the Lexington area and all things related to thoroughbreds. Also very easy to get to downtown Lexington.

What a lovely place. Spent a few nights with my daughter as a little getaway over the holidays. Julia and Hal are lovely and even offered a riding lesson - what a treat!! It was wonderfully serene with everything you could possibly need. Very clean and comfortable. We quite enjoyed our stay! Feeding the horses apples and carrots right outside the door was a real treat! After arriving, my daughter started planning our return! Wonderful all around!
We had a great 2 night stay. Beautiful, peaceful setting, friendly horses, clean and exactly as described. We would definitely book this property again.

We had a lovely stay with our dog at Julia and Hal‚Äôs! The cabin and amenities were as described, very clean with gorgeous views and cozy decor. Even extra puzzles, books, and games! It felt very private and they were very responsive to any needs. Taking our dog for walks around the property and visiting with the horses provided a perfect escape in nature. The fireplace also made this an idyllic winter getaway. We would love to come back!

The cabin is clean, comfortable and in a lovely, private location. Julia and Hal went out of their way to make us feel welcome. It‚Äôs perfect for the horse lover as a base for exploring KY Horse Park and the surrounding area. We would definitely stay there again!

it has a beautiful river in the backyard. An enclosed deck to sit and watch it while drinking a cup of coffee. a bit smaller expected and no privacy between rooms as they not fully enclosed. The livingroom was not very Inviting to watch TV or to cuddle and it got dark at 5:30 so not too much to do after that. I would probably a place to stay In the summer time where you could be outside more. BBQ, etc.
Beautiful place. Great stay.
Quiet and wonderful setting. Great location easy to get to everything. kitchen well-equipped. two bathrooms both well equipped. we really enjoyed our stay.

Can‚Äôt say enough good things. Beautiful and private setting where you can unwind at the end of the day by the fireplace or on the porch or deck enjoying the sites. Everything was very clean and we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Look forward to staying during our next KY Horse Park visit, which was very close.

We arrived after dark and saw two deer in the yard by the cabin and a little white pony nose poking out from the paddock. The cabin is so cute, clean and quiet. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to return some day.
Awesome location. Peaceful setting close to downtown, Keeneland, whiskey tours, etc. Loved it.

My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights with our little dog. This was our second time staying here, we loved it that much the first time! The place is adorable, clean & very comfortable with everything you need for a fun & pleasant stay! Plus, the bed is the most comfortable one I‚Äôve slept in, in a long time. We love the location and enjoyed feeding carrots to the horses right outside the front door. The peaceful & serene screened in porch with a creek view is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or a nightcap.

Charming cabin bordering a creek and surrounded by trees and horse pastures. Sitting on the screen porch listening to the birds and nearby horses was the perfect way to end busy days. The internet was very slow when we arrived but Hal and Julia went above and beyond and had a fiber optic service installed while we were there.
Great cabin in a great location. Beautiful country setting!
Very needed oasis to recharge, meditate and fill our minds with peace. Tranquil setting. Grateful...
Ideal for a couple and convenient to Lexington and the Georgetown area. The internet is a tad slow but adequate. We‚Äôve booked our next stay with Julia and Hal.

Great people
Great place
Will be back!

My husband and I, and our 2 small dogs, had a wonderful time during our week-long stay for my husband‚Äôs birthday to escape the city. The location is very convenient to get around while providing a scenic and serene getaway. We rode bikes from the Airbnb to downtown Lexington one of the days to visit Blue Stallion Brewery-beautiful ride with a lot of hills. We had an issue with house cleaners at check-in, however, the hosts did everything and more to remedy the situation. We would happily stay here again!

This was a really cute cabin- rustic but very clean. Perfect for a weekend stay. Just a note- if you need internet or WiFi, it is really slow and cell reception is bad in the cabin. That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. Hosts very responsive and nice.

Great cabin with all the essentials! The beautiful view of creek and horses were just what we needed for a retreat before moving our daughter to UK. Our son loved the zipline. Julia & Hal we‚Äôre welcoming.
Was a wonderful spot and turned out to be the highlight of our trip. Granddaughter lovrd the horses.

Exactly as it was described and it is beautiful there. We saw lots of wildlife and it was very close to everything we had planned for our trip. Quick, easy, and pain free check in! Very clean and had everything we needed for our week stay. I would rate this AirBnb as an A+! We are planning on going back!
Absolutely wonderful!! Can‚Äôt wait to come back next year.

What a treat to stay in the heart of horse country on a private horse farm! This cabin is in the most peaceful setting, with birds and horses making their sweet sounds all around. The beds are very comfortable and the kitchen thoughtfully supplied with a Keurig, coffee pods, bottled water and all kitchen appliances and cookware. You would not need to leave the property to have a wonderful getaway, however it's within 10 minutes of the Kentucky Horse Park and 30 minutes from Claiborne Farm. It was a perfect place for pur family of four (2 adults and 15 year old twins). The zip line in the yard was a fun surprise. Book today and enjoy your trip!

We loved our stay here! The cottage is clean and lovely with all of the amenities you would need. The screened in back patio offers a beautiful view of the creek. Our daughter loved the zip line and loved even more being able to wake up to a different horse right outside each day. We would absolutely stay here again.

Great spot for a family to stay and enjoy the quiet. We got some relaxing family time in with our 4 and 9 yr old. Had all the amenities we could want. Thank you!
Such a pretty area. Julia and Hal‚Äôs place was an easy location for us to get to all the sights in Lexington.

Beautiful, comfortable, and peaceful place. Sit by the creek and listen to the water run. So relaxing!! Our teen boys loved the zip line. WiFi signal was weak. Everything else was excellent!! Would definitely stay here again!!

We absolutely loved our stay; the pictures and descriptions do not do this cabin justice. There was plenty of room for our family of four. The kitchen was well stocked, plenty of games for family game nights, and a full size laundry room with detergent. The children enjoyed petting the horses, playing in the creek, and ziplining. The drive to the house is breathtaking! While visiting, we toured Mill Ridge Farm and had a good southern dinner at Ramsey's Diner. I highly recommend both.
We hope this won't be our last trip to your Airbnb!
My husband and I had a great stay. A perfect get away . Highly recommend.

Picturesque setting and convenient to restaurants and area attractions. Very comfortable for a couple. The loft has 2 single beds and spiral staircase as advertised as well as a low ceiling. Well equipped kitchen and washer/dryer. The Wi Fi is slow. We liked it well enough to book again.
Wonderful place. Even more than we expected. Many amenities, beautiful creek view. Quiet and peaceful. Fun feeding and petting the horses. We loved it, and highly recommend it.

We loved staying at Julia and Hal‚Äôs cabin. It was the perfect place for us to unwind and relax after our time in Louisville for Derby Week.
The cabin was extremely clean and well maintained, and had everything we needed to cook dinner both nights of our stay. The grill worked well, and the deck was fantastic to relax on, with a tranquil view of the stream below the cabin.
We loved spending time with the horse by our cabin, and he loved eating carrots and apples from our hands!
The bed was comfortable, we both slept well. We were thrilled to do some laundry in the washer/dryer, it cut down on our packing considerably!
We accidentally left our souvenir bats from Louisville Slugger behind after check out. Those could have been lost forever, but Julia and Hal were very accommodating and allowed us entry to the property to retrieve them. That mistake could have put a damper on our whole trip, thankful it didn‚Äôt!
We would definitely stay again next time in the area, hopefully for longer!

What a wonderful place to stay. They are such wonderful hosts with a beautiful property. It is so peaceful and warm. Best place we have ever stayed on the app by far. Highly encourage everyone to visit this wonderful place.
What an amazing place, the perfect getaway!

Perfect couples getaway. Nice little touches and everything we needed to stay in if we wanted. Quiet, peaceful and beautiful. Very relaxing yet with the bonus of wifi and cable. Close to lots of activities with a lovely surrounding area. Plus a horse friend right outside your door. Don't forget the apples and carrots :). Hosts were accomidating. We had a great time.

Julia‚Äôs place is wonderful! It is well located for getting around the area to activities in horse and bourbon country. It is very easy to get to downtown Lexington to see all that is there too. Julia is very good at communicating and making sure everything is well. Her place is very clean and comfortable. We would definitely return here when we are back in the area.
Great location in the heart of horse country. We loved the property. Two bathrooms with great showers! Kids loved looking at the horses and the zip line.

What Ana AMAZING place!! The view is like a painting. Horses pastures on 3 sides and a river on the 4th. Pure peace and quiet. The is perfect. Open, yet bedrooms spaces far enough apart for privacy. So much natural light. Enjoyed having my coffee on the porch overlooking the water and seeing more horses on the other side.
Great place to stay on very nice grounds!

What a beautiful cottage and view! It has a nice sized laundry room and master suite. Our kids especially loved the zip line and the adorable pony right outside your front door. Such a charming place!
Great location and views!

Cherish the cabin! Our family had the best time staying at Julia and Hal's cabin (can you call it a cabin with it has a master suite with its own bathroom?! Everything was as outlined in the listing, but better. The cabin is located at the back of Julia and Hal's property, overlooking a beautiful stream and surrounded by rolling hills. You'll have company from at least one of the resident horses, which hangs out in the field right next to the cabin. Our kids loved petting the horses, riding on the zip line and exploring area around the cabin. Pro tip: bring a few apples or carrots and you'll make a new best friend.
For the most part we hung out at the cabin, BBQ'd on the Green Egg grill and enjoyed the evenings on the screened-in porch overlooking the stream. Within 20 mins you can be grabbing dinner in downtown Lexington or going out on a horseback riding adventure. We'd definitely stay here again. Thanks Julia and Hal for sharing!
What a wonderful stay we had on this gorgeous property. We would highly recommend staying here. Thank you!
Great place in a great location. Perfect for exploring the Lexington area.

We really enjoyed the peace and quiet at the horse farm. The first few days we spent
reading books, watching the river and listening to all the different bird songs. Very calming. We did break away, though, for Mass in Georgetown and some sightseeing. We toured Bluegrass Distillers - fun, and Mary Todd Lincoln's home - interesting. We went antiquing and stopped at a very nice gift shop that surprisingly had Meissen monkey band figurines. The Lexington Cemetery is peaceful, historic and a pretty place to walk. A hike at Raven Run Nature Sanctuary brought us to a gorgeous view of the Kentucky River. We spent a morning at the International Horse Museum, broke for lunch, then did the sculpture walk and visited the barns in the afternoon. It was a most pleasant day. My husband enjoyed his chats with Hal. We're both thankful we got to explore a bit of Lexington. The countryside with all the horses is beautiful.
We enjoyed our stay at this cabin. The wood burning fireplace was especially nice. The cabin is situated on a horse farm with views of the creek. We plan to return.

Located in picturesque horse
country, this place is such a beautiful little slice of heaven. Great location as its close to downtown Lexington. The horses are friendly & adorable. While sitting out back enjoying the river we also enjoyed some deer, views of other horse farms and a bald eagle. We will absolutely come back.
Beautiful setting ‚Äî tranquil and serene. Perfect for couple.

A Beautiful location in the heart of horse country. Location is excellent , close enough interstate but secluded enough to enjoy the quietness of the country. Guest house if excellent with beautiful views of river and neighboring horse pastures. Fully stocked kitchen, covered porch for morning coffee, Can‚Äôt wait to go back.

Very nice, private place in a great location if horses are your primary reason to visit Lexington. Awesome views and all amenities are there. Only issue, not that it was that bad, was the bed could be more comfortable. Beautiful place to spend Christmas with our daughter. Will definitely consider staying there again when we visit her later in the year.
Lovely cabin in a very peaceful setting. We plan to stay again!
Julia and Hal were very responsive and treated us amazing! The house and property is beautiful. We will for sure be back for another stay.
Fabulous location with a beautiful serene environment! We would book again with no hesitation.

Highly recommend! The property is stunning and the location is very convenient. We saw plenty of deer and turkey crossing the creek, which was an added bonus to the trip. The ladder to the loft was a little wobbly (would not recommend for young ages or elderly), but that's honestly the only downfall I noticed. Communication was easy, as Julia and Hal were very quick to respond. They provided everything we needed from check in to check out, and we are so appreciative. We had such a great and relaxing time staying here and will likely stay here again!
A great spot for a relaxing and quiet getaway!
Great stay! Amazing location!
Such a lovely quiet and clean location and thoughtful hosts. We enjoyed our stay and look forward to staying again when we‚Äôre in the area.

We loved our stay here. The drive is so picturesque and it was delightful to have two friendly horses greet us just outside our place. The fireplace and furniture is so cozy with a beautiful view of the creek. The kitchen was well stocked with tea, coffee, and the necessary appliances. I would note that the upper loft is only for people who are able bodied and it is not for small children as it is a bit tricky to go up and down. However it added to the charm and adventure of the place. We will definitely stay here again on our next Lexington trip and hopefully with more time to use the kayaks!
Lovely and just perfect! Could not have been more charming-We can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

This is a delightful cottage which sits on a gated horse farm in the heart of Lexington horse country. The drive to the farm is breathtaking! The accommodations were delightful, well appointed and with lots of special touches. Communication was a breeze. I definitely look forward to returning!

This is the perfect cabin for a couple or small family wanting that immersive horse experience! The drive in is absolutely picturesque and the property is gorgeous! Very quiet and private. Clean and well stocked. Hal and Julia were so kind and accommodating. Our girls loved the ponies, horses and the zip line! Beautiful views of the river from almost anywhere in the cabin. Will definitely be back!
This is a awesome place to stay quiet and beautiful everything you would need

Beautiful property located close to local attractions. The cabin is lovely with lots of natural light. Julia and Hal were incredibly responsive. Very clean and well appointed cabin- plenty of towels, blankets, dishes, etc. the screened in porch was the perfect spot to enjoy morning coffee. Dusty the pony was a fan favorite. Hope to be back soon!

Great location for all things ‚Äú horse country‚Äù. Private yet secure. Cabin was clean and kitchen well stocked. Great communication before, during and after my stay. Property is gorgeous ! Looking forward to returning soon.
Julia & Hal have always provided a perfect stay. This was my third stay‚Äîthe setting is awesome. Waking up to the horses and porch overlooking the creek are such a relaxing start to the day!
Darling cabin, very quiet and private but close to Lexington. Loved being in the midst of beautiful horse farms!
House is clean, comfortable, view is beautiful and everything was as described. Great hosts with good communication. Always enjoy seeing horses in the fields.
Beautiful property and so close to the Kentucky Horse Park!

This is my husband‚Äôs and my favorite place to truly unplug and relax. Julia and Hal are super helpful and responsive for anything you need. The cabin is fantastic and the screened in porch overlooking the creek is my favorite place to wake up with a coffee and take in the surroundings. We cooked almost all our meals in the well equipped kitchen and obviously got some great grilling in on the Green Egg! We usually play in the creek with our dogs and visit with the horses just outside our door. This location is also right in the heart of some of the best biking if you are into that! We love cruising through the horse farms and taking in the views. Highly recommend. (we will certainly be back!)

My daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay on this farm. The guest house was comfortable, it‚Äôs location was great, and the surroundings are beautiful! Very peaceful on the back porch and all the French doors allow you to fully take in the pastures and the stream, etc. We would stay again:-)
Very peaceful & tranquil spot. We definitely will be returning there again.

This location is absolutely perfect for those wanting to explore horse farms. It is a rather short drive to downtown Lexington if you want to explore the city. The accommodations are comfortable and the scenery is perfect. Hal was very friendly and showed us around the property. Plan to visit again someday!

This place is great! It's right in the most beautiful part of Horse Country. It is located on the hosts property yet it is secluded and safe. We found it very relaxing. It was super clean and cute as could be inside. We met Hal in the driveway and he immediately emailed us dining options in the area. We will definitely try to stay here again if we come back to Lexington.

My boyfriend and I stayed at this beautiful cottage for two nights and absolutely loved it. We fed the horses carrots and apples and we were able to walk around the property to see the animals. Miki's place was very nice, comfortable and a perfect location for getting around downtown. Definitely would recommend staying here!
great place, great location

Miki was an outstanding host. The place is beautiful and very functional. She has thought through all the details and we didn't lack for anything. this space is so lovely and Miki is the best host! i can't recommend renting here enough!!!

We stayed for 3 nights. Everything was great in the room. I had to work from the apartment the first day, internet connectivity was great, including voice calls.

Miki has an awesome space! Close to West 6th- one of my favorite breweries. Close to downtown and easily accessible. The space was clean and it seemed like Miki had thought of just about everything you might need at an airbnb! Would absolutely recommend

Once again, Miki made our stay in Lexington fantastic. Miki's place is so close to everything and a fun brewery just a few walking blocks away!
Secluded but yet close to everything in Lexington. Charming, clean and stocked with everything you need.
Such a great place, in a great location! Amazing amenities, heavenly bed, quiet & much more! We had such a great time and highly recommend!!

Miki's apartment was very comfortable. It looks like it was recently remodeled--the sinks and tub and fixtures were new. Miki's place was perfect for our NYE weekend! Very clean and welcoming. Miki was also always available for quick replies when we had questions. If you're looking for a cute AirBnB on the northeast side of Lexington, this is a great spot!
Very cozy bedroom, bath, and kitchen. Quiet and was able to sleep REALLY well. Near a nice brewpub.
Another fantastic stay. I very highly recommend Miki's place!!

Miki goes above and beyond to make sure her guests have everything they need.

Another great stay at Miki's studio!
Highly recommend her place!

Miki's place was so clean, cute, cozy, and at a great location. Best Airbnb we have stayed in to date (and we travel quite often!)

Another great stay at Miki's place!

We are already discussing booking a weekend with her to go to Keeneland next year. It'd be a close, fabulous home base.

This was my first experience using Air bnb and it surpassed all my expecations! I have been coming to Lexington for the past 3 years to see my son and have always stayed in hotels. This is our third stay at Miki's place & it is becoming a welcome "Home away from Home"
Very happy we have found this gem while doing our relocation to Lexington with Toyota. It is close to all that we want to explore in downtown Lexington & a very easy drive to and from Toyota!!

What a gem of a place! Miki's responsiveness was quick & she was helpful with all questions.
The studio has lots of great warm touches that make you feel right at home. Comfortable, Well stocked & super clean.
It is within walking distance to several places to grab a coffee, evening drink or a bite to eat.
Wonderful stay!

The apartment was perfect for my husband and I for a five day trip to attend a wedding. The apartment included numerous amenities including a full kitchen, a washer, television, and a full bathroom. The bed was extremely comfortable. I would highly recommend staying here.
Great little apartment! Super cute and awesome location for seeing all things Lexington. Walkable to restaurants, bars and breweries, yet quiet place to relax!

This is the best Airbnb in Lexington! Comfortable, cozy, private, quiet, safe, meticulously clean, great location, ample street parking, full amenities--an efficiency-apartment version of home that makes it feel like you are in fact at home. Miki is so welcoming and so fast with communication that it feels almost instantaneous. Cannot recommend her place highly enough!
Amazing apartment, I would definitely stay again. Very clean and cozy, highly recommend!

Miki's place was lovely and exactly what we we were looking for. The apartment was well stocked, very clean, and Miki was so helpful with the instructions for check in. I'd definitely recommend staying here!

Nice spot and down the street from 6th Street Brewery. I enjoyed walking the neighborhood to Doodles and seeing all the great architecture. The parking was easy and convenient across the street and it wasn't an extremely busy place.

Great place to stay while in town for a conference!
A lovely apartment with a lovely host.

This is a great long term stay option. I spent the summer in Lexington, and this was a great place. I never had to park more than three doors from the house, and generally parked straight across the street. The stairs are a little challenging to move heavy bags up and down, but not impossible. My adult daughter and I stayed here during the Rolex 3 day event. The location is great and somehow combines walkability and urban life with wonderful privacy. We really appreciated the full kitchen one night when we were too tired to go out to dinner and the gardens in the back are lovely. I would recommend planning for the small, winding staircase by packing in smaller bags that are easy to carry. Be sure to take the time to walk around and check out the local food and view the pretty gardens.

Thank you so much to Miki! I loved the space, the bed was so very comfortable, and I appreciated all of the personal touches such as organic treats and welcome note that were there for my arrival. I used a bicycle that was available every day that took me to "Doodles" for breakfast, "Third Street Stuff," for fancy coffee/espresso drinks, and Minton's for some healthy and tasty food. so that was wonderful and got me to food and coffee every day. Miki was helpful and available when needed, but otherwise offered complete privacy. I felt very happy, taken care of and comfortable. Thank you again, Miki! This was another great Airbnb experience for me, and I would recommend you to anyone who asks. :)

Miki's place is just perfect for one person or a couple for a short or longer stay in Lexington. Miki is very communicative and kept me posted about various important bits of information during my stay (like what to do with a tornado warning and how to turn on the air conditioning if needed). She provided me with fresh eggs from the chickens in the yard - such a treat!
The space had everything I needed for a 2-week stay, including just the right cooking utensils to prepare most of my own meals. It is in a great location, very close to several tasty restaurants (plus a brewery and a micro-distillery) and a cute little park. As Miki notes, the stairs up in to the apartment are indeed very steep and a bit challenging for getting stuff up and down - I would recommend Miki's place without hesitation to anyone except those with limited mobility (because of the stairs).

Clean, quiet, a nice stay! The only issue with this location is that there is a pretty tricky staircase to navigate to get to the apartment. Pack light! And if you aren't physically able to climb stairs comfortably and confidently, this location won't work well for you. However, I have no complaints and would stay here again.

This was a great place to stay for our nephew's wedding. Miki answered all of our questions. The apartment was lovely and was full of everything we needed. The bed was very comfortable. We would definitely stay here again if we ever return to Lexington.
Great place to stay.

I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this adorable, cozy apartment, which was stocked with all the amenities one could hope for. It was a very quiet couple of nights in a great neighborhood. Also, the hosts were fantastic with providing check-in information via message before my arrival. Will definitely stay here again next time I'm in Lexington!

The apartment was described perfectly and just right for my needs. It is convenient to a great brewery, restaurant and a 3 minute drive to downtown, Rupp Arena area. The bed was wonderful and I looked forward to it each night. I will definitely select Miki's place for future trips!
A cozy, quaint place to get away! Loved the amenities and wonderful instructions!
Wow! Such a find. Extremely well equipped kitchen, cozy bed, great light. Just a stellar airbnb. Fantastic experience!
Miki's place is beautiful and very comfortable. Great location and very quiet. She has all the amenities of staying in a home away from home.
Nothing bad to say! Check-in was a breeze and the apartment was perfect for what we needed. Great home base for distillery tours.
Great cozy spot near Lexington's downtown.
Great location and a very kind and welcoming host. The place has everything we needed, and it felt safe. Will definitely stay here again.

Miki's place is clean and comfortable and all the little personal touches made us feel very welcome. It's in a very convenient location, super easy to get to our favorite places downtown. We will definitely be booking another stay in the future!!

My best AirBnb experience ever!! The place was more than what I expected. I felt like I was home during the entire stay. Communication was easy and prompt. The place was cute, neat and clean. The location was really convenient. If I go back to Lexington, I am going to use this place again!

A bit of strength and agility is required to get the luggage up the stairs but that was our only difficulty here. Close to great restaurants and central to anywhere you need to go in Lexington, we would stay here again.

Miki was a great host. She made the space very warm and inviting. Everything my 15-year-old daughter and I needed was provided. She even allowed us to extend our stay an additional night. I will definitely try to stay at her Urban Farm again when we return to Lexington.

Miki is wonderful guest. We had some memorable days at Miki's place. The room was very clean and well decorated. The room located very near to the downtown. I'll definitely stay here if I come again to Lexington and I recommend this place.

The apartment was exactly as described. It was comfortable and clean, and Miki did an exceptional job stocking it with helpful "just in case" traveller amenities. She also laid out everything it very detailed directions, down to which drawers contained flatware and which light switches operated which lights. The attention to detail was fantastic.

The neighborhood was great; an easy walk to downtown Lexington, and it was quiet and safe.

I would leave 6 stars if it were possible. Would definitely stay again.

Miki's place was great. The house has a huge backyard that would be very comfortable to sit in and read, and I almost felt bad that I didn't have enough time in Lexington to do so. The details that stood out to me was having a welcome message on a black board by the private entrance and local chocolates inside the kitchen, both of which did a lot to make us feel welcome.

The place is near downtown, about .75 miles away. Its on the edge of a really nice historical district and it's a nice walk into town, but there isn't much to see in the immediate neighborhood. Overall, a great place and I would definitely stay again.

Very nice, clean apartment that's great for one person or a couple. Miki provided everything you'd expect a hotel to provide. Nice neighborhood, 3 blocks from a nice brewery, very close to downtown Lexington (walkable on a nice day). Highly recommended it.

Miki made us feel very welcomed. We came to ride in the Horsey Hundred in Georgetown, KY. The studio apartment was very clean and very comfortable. Our experience beginning to end was simply wonderful. From the chalkboard sign welcome and local chocolates to the extremely well appointed studio, we definitely felt at home. Miki was a wonderful host and super prompt with communication. The space was well organized and super clean. If business was to take me on an extended trip to Lexington, I would bend over backwards to stay there.

Miki was a great host and offers a very nice place to stay. I arrived to a welcome board with my name on it, and a very thoughtful plate of local candies/chocolates awaiting. Miki's place was nice, clean and comfortable. The location was close to some great restaurants and the neighborhood was ideal for walking. Our stay was short, but we really enjoyed Lexington with Miki's help!

The urban farm house in Lexington was a great place to stay while we were in town. Miki and Tom were wonderful hosts and were always available if we needed anything. The room is very clean and spacious. The kitchen was great for cooking breakfast. We would definitely stay here again!

Very well-prepared apartment . Miki made everything available and easy to understand . She just thought of absolutely everything you might possibly need. Would highly recommend this to other people and when I return to Lexington I hope I can book this place with her .
Charming neighborhood with great walking nearby. The space is cozy but has everything you need. A full kitchen and laundry were a big plus.

We traveled with a loose schedule, and Miki was wonderfully accommodating. The space was quirky and beautiful, and everything we hoped for. This was such a relaxing place to stay! The listing was very accurate. The location is on a nice, quiet side street right near a great brewery/restaurant and within easy walking distance of downtown. I love Miki's cozy place! Perfect for a getaway. Welcoming, perfectly appointed, convenient...it had it all!

Miki's place was great: quiet, comfortable, clean and exactly as described. There was the extra nice touch of flowers and some chocolate to welcome us. We felt right at home. She was very accessible and easy to communicate with. We will definitely come back!

The place was great and located in a convenient and safe area. Miki was very accommodating. Miki was very helpful and her response time was almost immediate. I'd definitely recommend Miki's place to anyone visiting Lexington. Thanks again.

Miki's place is exactly as listed and comes with everything you'll need for a comfortable stay. Great location with easy access to downtown and surrounding neighborhoods. The street has many beautiful historic homes and more within close walking distance. Apt has literally everything you need from toiletries to Netflix to reading material and even cute chickens to watch in the backyard. Would definitely stay here again if visiting Lexington.

Miki's place is wonderful. She had everything we needed and more. This place is very comfortable and inviting. The location is pretty close to downtown (about a mile), but doesn't seem to be, immediately, in the nicest of areas. We felt very safe inside the apartment though. I would recommend this listing to anyone going to Lexington!

Miki's apartment was lovely and so well furnished! She's a very nice person, toughtful, and she has made my arrival very easy.

I am looking forward to another visit! Thanks, Miki!
Miki was very helpful and made sure my stay was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.

Miki made me feel very welcome at her adorable place. I was exploring Lexington after an interview, and this was a perfect location for that in a historic neighborhood. Everything was as described. Very comfortable bed, cute decorations, everything you could need and more. I would love to visit Lexington again just to stay at her place!
Miki's place was wonderful! It was clean and cozy and we had a lovely weekend away. We would stay again and we would recommend to our friends and family!
Excellent experience. Apartment is clean and comfy with lots of amenities. In apartment laundry available, clean towels, coffee, Netflix. Would definitely stay again.

The listing was exactly as listed and was in a perfect location. They were local breweries within walking distance along with restaurants and other bars. Rupp arena was a short walk, and commonwealth stadium a short uber. Thank you all so much for your hospitality! I will definitely be back!

Miki made us feel right at home. Apartment was as described and then some. She made sure we were comfortable the entire trip and helped us troubleshoot some minor WIFI problems. Location is perfect. Was a quick $5 Uber to downtown, or you can walk there in about 15 minutes. It's about a 15 minute Uber ride to Keeneland and a 10 minute ride to the UK campus. I plan on staying here every trip I make to Lexington.
A beautiful get away.

Quaint and mostly quiet little place. Would have been nice to have a bathroom door for privacy from the rest of the room... nothing but a shower curtain there. Just remember farm chores start at 8 incase you want to sleep in.
One of the best bnbs I‚Äôve stayed in. So refreshing to get above and beyond expectations. Farm was beautiful and space was exactly perfect for what I needed. Definitely would recommend!
Everything was perfect, Janet was a wonderful host. This air bnb is a gem!! Perfect location if you want peace and tranquility!!

We could not have chosen a better place to spend our week in Kentucky. It was so welcoming and comfortable inside and out. We felt at home right away. Beautiful serene environment but yet a short drive from great restaurants and entertainment.
Janet was so genuine and hospitable in all interactions from booking questions months prior to our stay all the way through our departure. 10/10 in all areas.

We have stayed there before with no issues. We loved the peace and quiet and beautiful surroundings. This time Janet had two dogs guarding her goats and they barked all night. She suggested that we move somewhere else when we requested that she keep the dogs in the shed at night. Will never return.

Enjoyed our stay very much. Nice and quiet with plenty of animals to see and visit, especially if you have kids. Our son loved the animals. Beautiful views. Host was nice and very responsive. Would stay here again!
This stay was so nice. Space was so comfortable and cute, property was simply beautiful. I thoroughly enjoyed myself.
Exactly as described. Picture perfect location and not too far of a drive to downtown Lexington.

Janet's place was beautiful and peaceful! Janet's location was right outside of Lexington where you had everything you needed.
I would highly recommend Janet's place to stay if you are looking for a place to stay near or around Lexington!
Beautiful views on the drive in, very cozy and had everything we needed. Went above with having soap and lotion, games, movies, little snacks, and coffee pods for us to use.
We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Jan's, visiting with her animals, and speaking with her! Jan communicated perfectly and we'd happily stay there again.

Probably the best place we‚Äôve ever stayed through AirBnB. Peaceful, private, clean, and a great value. What more could you ask for?
We got to interact with the animals every morning which gave every day an awesome start. The horse racing decor is a fun added touch!
My first time in the Lexington area was fun and stress free! All of the animals were so friendly and beautiful. Janet has great recommendations for food and entertainment. Thank you Janet!

Such a beautiful location in horse country. Quiet and serene, just what we needed. Good location to jump on the highway and get to Nashville and Louisville.
All the necessities were taken care of and the goats and dogs were fun to watch.
Highly recommend for a couple looking for peace and quiet.

I had a delightful stay at this quiet Airbnb. The serene atmosphere provided a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle. The charming accommodation, coupled with attentive hosts, made for a truly memorable experience. Highly recommend for those seeking tranquility.

Janet's place is AMAZING. Located in a barn (but separate from the stalls), the space looks out onto a beautiful landscape - complete with goats and a horse! The space itself was spacious (plenty enough for two people), clean, and featured a coffee machine, fridge, a futon, chair, and comfortable bed. Located about 20ish minutes from downtown Lexington, it was nice to stay a little away from the hustle and bustle from downtown. It was an easy drive to downtown, though! Finally, Janet was responsive and left many great recommendations for places around town. I would highly recommend staying at Janet's place while visiting Lexington! Plus, who doesn't love being able to see cute goats every day!
Had a wonderful stay here. It was so cozy and the perfect place to hibernate during the rainy weather. Very beautiful and peaceful surroundings.

Private, peaceful, serene getaway. Such a cozy, beautiful little home away from home. Waking up here is like nothing else. All of your worries are carried away with the beautiful view of farm and wildlife.

Very adorable, nice little place! Really enjoyed the horse they had there! Regardless of it being attached to the barn, privacy was immensely respected and we were not bothered at all the entire trip. Accommodations such as towels and blankets were plentiful and much appreciated. Even during our stay in the middle of winter, the trip was made so much warmer and relaxing with this barn-apartment! Easy-to-follow directions, personally the item attached to the key was hilarious for both me and my wife. Overall lovely place, very comfortable bed!
